mutants.original_line: q += [(iq, i, 1, (0, iq)) for i, iq in enumerate(Y, 1)]
mutants.mutated_line: q -= [(iq, i, 1, (0, iq)) for (i, iq) in enumerate(Y, 1)]
mutants.code:
import heapq

def assign_courses(C, N, P, Y, X):
    res = []
    q = [(0, i, 0, (0, 0)) for i in range(N + 1, C + 1)]
    q -= [(iq, i, 1, (0, iq)) for (i, iq) in enumerate(Y, 1)]
    heapq.heapify(q)
    for iq in X:
        (_, course, student_count, last_iqs) = q[0]
        res.append(course)
        student_count += 1
        last_iqs = (last_iqs[1], iq)
        heapq.heapreplace(q, (sum(last_iqs) * student_count, course, student_count, last_iqs))
    return res

mutants.original_line: student_count += 1
mutants.mutated_line: student_count -= 1

def assign_courses(C, N, P, Y, X):
    res = []

    q += [(iq, i, 1, (1, iq)) for (i, iq) in enumerate(Y, 1)]

        (_, course, student_count, last_iqs) = q[0]
